scenes.description: Little Red Riding Hood's mother asks her to delivery some food to her sickly grandmother, advising her to stay strictly on the path.
scenes.title: Request

scenes.description: The Big Bad Wolf spots Little Red Riding Hood in the forest and secretly stalks her.
scenes.title: Stalking

scenes.description: The Big Bad Wolf approaches Little Red Riding Hood, who tells him where she is going. He suggests that the girl pick some flowers as a present for her grandmother, which she does.
scenes.title: Conversation

scenes.description: While Little Red Riding Hood is picking flowers, the Big Bad Wolf goes to the grandmothers' house
scenes.title: Wolf goes to Grandmother's

scenes.description: The Big Bad Wolf gains entry by pretending to be Little Red Riding Hood
scenes.title: Wolf impersonates Little Red

scenes.description: The Big Bad Wolf swallows the grandmother whole and waits for the girl, disguised as the grandmother
scenes.title: Wolf swallows grandmother

scenes.description: When Little Red Riding Hood arrives at her grandmother's house, she notices that her grandmother looks very strange.
scenes.title: Little Red arrives at Grandmother's

scenes.description: The Wolf jumps out of bed and eats her, too.
scenes.title: Wolf swallows Little Red

scenes.description: An hunter comes to the rescue, cutting open the sleeping wolf.
scenes.title: Hunter comes to the rescue

scenes.description: Little Red Riding Hood and her grandmother emerge shaken, but unharmed.
scenes.title: Hunter comes to the rescue

scenes.description: They fill the Wolf's stomach with heavy stones.
scenes.title: Stones

scenes.description: The Wolf tries to flee, but the stones cause him to collapse and die.
scenes.title: Wolf tries to flee
